description: The ‘Ohana Koa, a stylish member of the water - resistant ‘Ohana family, lives up to its name with a split-strap design that speaks to those that dare to push the boundaries. With a coral reef lug design on the outsole for added grip and traction, even if the boundary is slippery, you'll be just fine.
name: Olukai Ohana Koa - Mens

specs.value: Split strap, water-resistant, textured synthetic straps with ultra soft quick-drying jersey knit lining and a soft, comfortable nylon toe post
Compression molded, EVA midsole with brushed drop-in ICEVA footbed provides anatomical ﬁt for sustained comfort
Non-marking rubber outsole with coral reef lug design for added grip
